name: Shelf Pusher
description:
"Shelf Pusher" Trijam #172 entry by Shroudeye

Jam theme: "Off the shelf"

Game description:

Push the requested color from the incoming barrels.

Controls:

-HOLD-

Q/P: Arm piston 1

W/O: Arm piston 2

E/I: Arm piston 3

-PRESS ONCE-

Spacebar: Trigger armed pistons.

Use Alt+F4 to exit.

Enjoy!

Used assets:

Unreal Engine 4's starter contents, where applicable.

Known bugs:

Well. The collision on the barrels sometimes doesn't work. Ran out of time on that :)
